history.proof: unfold Included. unfold Total.forward_trace. intros. split. - apply H. - intros n s ms H'. qblast depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment state : Type state_R : Relation state x : trace state H : In (trace state) (fun tr : trace state => is_fin_stream tr /\\ (forall (n : nat) (s : state) (ms : MetaState state), tr n = Some (s, ms) -> Total.F.forward (Terminating s) ms)) x n : nat s : state ms : MetaState state H' : x n = Some (s, ms) Unable to unify "In (trace state) (fun tr : trace state => is_fin_stream tr /\\ (forall (n : nat) (s : state) (ms : MetaState state), tr n = Some (s, ms) -> Total.F.forward (Terminating s) ms)) x" with "Partial.F.forward (Terminating s) ms".

In environment state : Type state_R : Relation state x : trace state H : In (trace state) (fun tr : trace state => is_fin_stream tr /\\ (forall (n : nat) (s : state) (ms : MetaState state), tr n = Some (s, ms) -> Total.F.forward (Terminating s) ms)) x n : nat s : state ms : MetaState state H' : x n = Some (s, ms) Unable to unify "x n = Some (s, ms)" with "Partial.F.forward (Terminating s) ms".

original: unfold Included. unfold Total.forward_trace. simpl. intros. split. - apply H. - intros n s ms H'. apply H. apply H'.
